about_the_game:
A devastating alien pathogen, unearthed from the frozen depths of Antarctica, has unleashed chaos across the world. Once hailed as humanity's greatest discovery, the pathogen now fuels the ambitions of the shadowy Power Consortium—a ruthless alliance of corporations bent on weaponizing its horrifying potential. In the midst of this chaos, the PHANTOM Initiative rises to challenge the darkness.

Step into the boots of Dominic "Shadow" Kane, a BlackOps operative, as you infiltrate the heavily guarded Divinus Island. Your mission: dismantle the Consortium's operations, uncover the truth behind their sinister experiments, and survive the horrors they’ve unleashed. From high-tech labs to derelict villages swarming with abominations, each step brings you closer to the heart of the nightmare.

PAATH-Z features adrenaline-pumping combat, a gripping storyline, and richly detailed environments. Battle against relentless enemies—both human and mutant—in a fight where every decision could mean the difference between life and death. Uncover the dark secrets of the PAATH pathogen and confront the moral cost of humanity’s ambition.

Experience a reimagined vision of survival horror with modernized gameplay and immersive visuals that bring the terror to life. PAATH-Z is more than a game—it’s a descent into a world where survival is a luxury, and the fight for humanity’s future has just begun.

content_descriptors.notes: PAATH-Z is a game set in the heart of a brutal war zone, where intense violence is a core element of the experience. As a BlackOps PHANTOM soldier, you will face relentless battles against heavily armed enemies and grotesque zombie-like creatures created through sinister experiments. The gameplay involves tactical combat, with visceral action scenes depicting the harsh realities of survival. Like other game series of the same gender, PAATH-Z does not shy away from mature themes and graphic violence, emphasizing the chaos and danger of the mission. This game is designed for players who are ready to immerse themselves in a raw and unflinching battle for humanity’s survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 2GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: PAATH-Z is an intense third-person shooter blending tactical combat and survival horror. Play as a PHANTOM operative Dominic 'Shadow' Kane, infiltrating a secretive island to uncover dark experiments, battle mutated creatures, and dismantle a shadowy corporate conspiracy threatening humanity.
